title: Advanced Optimization Algorithms: PSO Algorithm and Machine Learning-Based Multi-Swarm Collaboration Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Optimization Algorithms (PSO), Calculus Fundamentals, Matrix Operations, and Python Programming Experience
context.additional_context: Students use online simulation tools via personal devices and collaborate on algorithm design projects during offline sessions

learning_goals: Implementation of a multi-population cooperative PSO algorithm to achieve over 80% success rate in global optima search for complex optimization problems
They can mathematically analyze and explain dynamic clustering adjustment strategies using HMM classification models
They can design adaptive control techniques that optimize algorithm parameters (inertia weight, acceleration coefficients) contextually
They can simulate information exchange mechanisms between multi-swarms to evaluate exploration-exploitation balance
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
